channel.title: CVE Feed for Fortinet -- FortiClientEMS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fortinet -- FortiClientEMS

item.title: CVE-2023-48788|2024-08-16T03:56:08.332Z -- fortinet -- forticlientems
item.description: A improper neutralization of special elements used in an sql command ('sql injection') in Fortinet FortiClientEMS version 7.2.0 through 7.2.2, FortiClientEMS 7.0.1 through 7.0.10 allows attacker to execute unauthorized code or commands via specially crafted packets.

item.title: CVE-2023-47534|2024-08-12T17:51:30.231Z -- fortinet -- forticlientems
item.description: A improper neutralization of formula elements in a csv file in Fortinet FortiClientEMS version 7.2.0 through 7.2.2, 7.0.0 through 7.0.10, 6.4.0 through 6.4.9, 6.2.0 through 6.2.9, 6.0.0 through 6.0.8 allows attacker to execute unauthorized code or commands via specially crafted packets.
